channel.title: Best way to learn Java [ in my opinion ]
channel.description:
Not much to say about this , this is links to a great guy AKA Bucky roberts , he's the one teaching you, im just posting it here to help all you "Newbies" to java , and also people who have a OK java knowledge, who may want to learn more Intermediate level, you can browse throght all them remember to Repeat the video's , untill you think you know , then you try the whole tuturial what your doing without help , works for me :P
Begginers Section - [url=http://thenewboston.org/list.php?cat=31]Beginner Java[/url]
Intermediate Section - [url=http://thenewboston.org/list.php?cat=25]Intermediate Java[/url]

item.title: Best way to learn Java [ in my opinion ]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Broken Britain, post:6, topic:462038”]What’s the reason you guys think he’s shit? I’ve never came across him before. Seems like he has a good goal in mind though, free education.[/quote][quote=“Broken Britain, post:4, topic:462038”]He doesn’t even capitalise his class names.[/quote]That’s one way you can tell he’s bad :L

Anyways, sorry, but we already have these:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

programming, irc, cars
